Release notes for Kendo UI Professional v2017.3.913

Components

What's new

  • Increased spacing between checkboxes/radio buttons and their labels (#3496)
  • Notification text color should have contrast (#3323)
  • Kendo UI Scaffolder should use a new VS 2017 extensibility format (#2900)
  • Implement Angular2 - Default and Bootstrap themes for Kendo UI widgets T3

What's fixed

  • The styling/panels demo is not styled for SASS themes
  • fix: Wrong color in the grid column menu (#3167)
  • DropDowns Popup appears in wrong position in IE in RTL mode when the page is scrolled (#3134)
  • kendo.support.browser miss 'edge' and 'mozilla' flags in TypeScript definitions (#2857)
  • support.placeholder misspelled in TypeScript definitions (#2852)
  • keys.NUMPAD_DOT missing in TypeScript definitions (#2851)
  • clearFileByUid typescript definition (#2430)
  • kendo.support.browser typescript definition is missing edge as an option (#2127)
  • Widget does not position popup element correctly in Windows 8 (touch enabled device) (#546)
  • Filter popup icons are too close to the text, there is not enough separating space.
  • Wrong icons color in Material themes.
  • Incorrect icon colors
  • Wrong checkbox appearance in different states (hover/focus/checked/unchecked) (#3259)

AngularJS

What's fixed

  • k-ng-model not set correctly with cascading ComboBoxes (#3446)

Application

What's fixed

  • MobileView header has zero height when its title has not value (#3409)

AutoComplete

What's fixed

  • mapValueTo: "dataItem" option does not apply selection in the list (#3227)
  • The selectedDataItems method returns always only the last selected item (#3046)
  • Incorrect dropdown position when the page is scrolled (IE) and rtl is enabled (#2744)
  • AutoWidth option not working as expected in some cases (#2632)
  • Unexpected padding-right: 1.9em of clearable inputs in RTL

Button

What's fixed

  • Non-text Image Button image not centered vertically (#3335)
  • Button icons don't align correctly when font-size is bigger or less than 14px; (#935)
  • Icon Button should be square

Calendar

What's new

  • Improved calendar keyboard navigation
  • Add multiple date selection to Calendar

What's fixed

  • Hover style is not removed from navigation arrow when it becomes disabled (#1461)
  • Widget "century" view does not support min value equal to "0001-01-01" (#439)
  • Widget "century" view does not support dates less then 200 year (#438)
  • Inconsistent appearance on hovering first/last year in Calendar decade view with Default, Black, Blue Opal, High Contrast, Moonlight, Silver and Uniform themes

Chart

What's new

  • Range Area Chart
  • Chart rtl support

What's fixed

  • White space in text is collapsed when rendering as SVG
  • An error is thrown when setting series.line.style "smooth" to any of the series except the first one in area chart (#2662)
  • getAxis does not return axis in a custom visual handler during the initial rendering. (#3273)
  • Grouped Line Chart data disappears from 2017 R1 (#3177)
  • Justified category axis could lead to missing dataItem in point tooltip template (#3077)
  • Line chart with invisible points fails to render (#3067)
  • Pie chart hangs browser on some values (#3042)
  • Labels are needlessly rotated when using auto rotation and reversed axis.
  • Normal area series and reversed area series in one chart is not working (#3174)

ComboBox

What's fixed

  • Unexpected padding-right: 1.9em of clearable inputs in RTL
  • ComboBox dataSource query() method throws an error when a configuration object parameter is set (#3399)
  • mapValueTo: "dataItem" option does not apply selection in the list (#3227)
  • SelectedItem in ComboBox cannot be removed (trough X button) in AngularJS scenario (#3352)
  • Top group header stays displayed, even when there are not matches. (#3194)
  • Loader is displayed in DropDownList/ComboBox when remote request is prevented on requestStart (#3056)
  • Cannot select Item with value 0 in ComboBox and DropdownList (#3029)
  • Mouse cursor automatically moved at the end of the text in the ComboBox input (#2960)
  • Incorrect dropdown position when the page is scrolled (IE) and rtl is enabled (#2744)
  • AutoWidth option not working as expected in some cases (#2632)
  • Dropdown height is incorrect when there is h* element in HeaderTemplate (#2373)
  • Widget doesn't keep caret position on typing (#2372)
  • k-ng-model not set correctly with cascading ComboBoxes (#3446)

DataSource

What's new

  • Grid infinite scroll
  • Improving performance with paging and sorting of DataSource with local data

What's fixed

  • DataSourceRequest Error is thrown in Kendo.MVC for asp.net Core 2.0 web application targeting .NET Framework 4.6.1 (#3546)

DatePicker

What's fixed

  • Hover style is not removed from navigation arrow when it becomes disabled (#1461)
  • Maximum call stack size exceeded if en-US culture is used with DatePicker (#3183)
  • Kendo UI DatePicker and DateTimePicker MVVM initialization ignores data-week-number option (#2731)

DateTimePicker

What's fixed

  • Hover style is not removed from navigation arrow when it becomes disabled (#1461)
  • Maximum call stack size exceeded if en-US culture is used with DatePicker (#3183)
  • Kendo UI DatePicker and DateTimePicker MVVM initialization ignores data-week-number option (#2731)

Dialog

What's fixed

  • Errors for Alert, Confirm and Prompt when building kendo typescript definitions using Typescript version 2.4 (#3454)
  • Displaced Dialog close button

Drawing

What's fixed

  • grid widget extension — drawDOM / pdf.saveAs — headers do not repeat when repeatHeaders true (#3075)
  • Path is not drawn correctly by Drawing API (#2606)
  • White space in text is collapsed when rendering as SVG

DropDownList

What's fixed

  • Keyboard navigation is not working when mapValueTo: "dataItem"
  • Double-clicking on a DropDownList makes it constantly focused (#3248)
  • mapValueTo: "dataItem" option does not apply selection in the list (#3227)
  • Loader is displayed in DropDownList/ComboBox when remote request is prevented on requestStart (#3056)
  • Cannot select Item with value 0 in ComboBox and DropdownList (#3029)
  • Filtering closes the keyboard in Android (#3012)
  • Incorrect dropdown position when the page is scrolled (IE) and rtl is enabled (#2744)
  • AutoWidth option not working as expected in some cases (#2632)
  • Dropdown height is incorrect when there is h* element in HeaderTemplate (#2373)
  • DropDownList with virtualization enabled and pageSize set throws js exception (MVVM binding) (#3426)

Editor

What's new

  • Allow customization of the columns of color picker tools' palette (#2723)
  • When the selection is in the begging of a non first list item and backspace is clicked, its content should be moved to the the previous one. (#2214)
  • Insert images into editor content via drag&drop from local file system

What's fixed

  • Editor's resize handle overlaps the vertical scroll bar's down arrow (#3445)
  • Editor tools icons color is not consistent in all themes (#3415)
  • Kendo loader does not hide after successfully deleting an image or deleting / creating a new folder in Editor's Insert image dialog (#3293)
  • Kendo Editor with textarea does not trigger the document's change event (#3276)
  • Broken layout of Editor's Image/File Browser dialog toolbar, if font-size is not 12px in all LESS themes (#3266)
  • Bullet list wrong cursor position after deletion (#2344)

FilterMenu

What's fixed

  • Menu closes after context menu of the browser is opened and hovered. (#3410)

Gantt

What's fixed

  • DateTime pickers on the Gantt edit form are wider than the other inputs in Material, Fiori and Nova themes
  • Gantt always escapes HTML elements passed as part of its Header Templates (#2405)
  • Displaced Gantt task percentage complete handle
  • Gantt toolbar border radius does not use variables in Bootstrap v3 theme (#2676)
  • Gantt task displacements in Material, Material Black and Nova themes in RTL
  • Illegible Gantt tasks text in Office 365 theme
  • Inconsistent appearance of Gantt Views chooser with Fiori Theme

Globalization

What's fixed

  • Some culture files are outdated due to differences between Windows 8 and Windows 10 date formats (#2899)
  • Wrong number formatting in es-SV culture (possibly others too) (#2421)

Grid

What's new

  • Persist dirty indicator with batch editing and client-side operations
  • CRUD operations with virtual scrolling
  • Grid keyboard navigation improvements.
  • Grid infinite scroll
  • Improving performance with paging and sorting of DataSource with local data

What's fixed

  • Sort icon in grouped item is broken.
  • Column menu icon in Grid headers are broken in SASS themes in IE (#3396)
  • Grid "selectable" column does not remove the selected state from the unlocked columns table (#3374)
  • If paperSize option is used together with footer template pdf export is misaligned (#3329)
  • When an input element is focused, the Grid will not receive the focus when clicked, and the keyboard navigation is not working. (#3291)
  • Grid Filter Checkbox not cleared on filter click (#3263)
  • The page size dropdown instantly closes in Chrome (#2768)
  • When the Grid is with persistSelection the selectedKeyNames method will still return the selected IDs after the clearSelection metho is used. (#3249)
  • Wrong color in the grid column menu (#3165)
  • The DropDown used for chaning the Grid current page, is not closing on mobile devices when clicking outside of it. (#3148)
  • Grid deselecting all rows with master checkbox fires change event two times
  • Keyboard navigation should persist column index
  • The Grid PDF export produces misaligned footer template when there is a hidden column. (#3549)

HierarchicalDataSource

What's fixed

  • Filter with empty object and array is not clearing the hierarchical filter (#3463)
  • "Maximum call stack size exceeded" error thrown by the HierarchicalDataSource with remote data and client-side filtering (#3300)
  • HierarchicalDataSource filter not working with serverFiltering true (#3208)
  • "Maximum call stack size exceeded" error thrown by the HierarchicalDataSource (#3185)

Map

What's fixed

  • Icon of map's marker is displaced in LESS themes.

MaskedTextBox

Menu

What's new

  • Allow openOnClick configuration for rootMenuItems and subMenuItems (#3479)

What's fixed

  • Menu closes after context menu of the browser is opened and hovered. (#3410)
  • On root Menu item click its opened submenu closes (IE) (#3338)
  • Menu's width is calculated as zero, when scrollable is enabled and the menu gets hidden in 700px screen size (#3334)
  • Cannot fire select event with encoded: false in Menu (#3050)
  • Kendo Menu k-state-focused bug (#3181)
  • Focused Menu items are not highlighted in Material, Material Black and Office 365 themes

MobileView

What's fixed

  • MobileView header has zero height when its title has not value (#3409)

MultiSelect

What's fixed

  • Incorrect position of MultiSelect's item close icon with Material, MaterialBlack, Nova and Fiori themes
  • MultiSelect items appearance is wrong when placed inside a Grid popup edit form (Nova theme) (#1734)
  • Incorrect dropdown position when the page is scrolled (IE) and rtl is enabled (#2744)
  • AutoWidth option not working as expected in some cases (#2632)
  • Dropdown height is incorrect when there is h* element in HeaderTemplate (#2373)
  • No style is applied to the Multiselect focused items if they are already selected
  • Unexpected darker corners of Multiselect when not hovered in Material theme
  • mapValueTo: "dataItem" option does not apply selection in the list (#3227)

NumericTextBox

What's fixed

  • NumericTextBox does not allow currency character to be pasted together with the numeric value (#2962)

PDF Export

What's fixed

  • The Grid PDF export produces misaligned footer template when there is a hidden column. (#3549)
  • text-transform: uppercase is ignored on PDF export (#3502)
  • Kendo UI Drawing Api with IE Edge misalignment (#3483)
  • Links which wrap a img element are not exported as expected on PDF. (#3359)
  • If paperSize option is used together with footer template pdf export is misaligned (#3329)
  • Generated pdf document cannot be saved using saveAs

Pager

What's fixed

  • The DropDown used for chaning the Grid current page, is not closing on mobile devices when clicking outside of it. (#3148)

PanelBar

What's fixed

  • PanelBar node's aria-hidden attribute on ul elements is not updated on interaction with nodes (#3241)
  • PanelBar node's aria-expanded attribute is false for initially expanded nodes (#3240)
  • Images are not vertically centered PanelBar with Fiori, Material, Material Black, Nova and Office 365
  • Sprites are not vertically centered PanelBar with Black, Blue Opal, Bootstrap v3, Default, Fiori, Flat, High Contrast, Metro, Metro Black, Moonlight, Nova, Office 365, Silver and Uniform themes

PivotGrid

What's fixed

  • PivotGrid renders some footer values as member values after collapse (#2609)
  • PivotGrid does not display all sub fields after reordering.

Scheduler

What's new

  • The view() method is documented as void, but it returns an object (#2924)
  • Selected events between resources and add ability to deselected with ctrl

What's fixed

  • Missing Scheduler View chooser toggle arrow
  • Keyboard navigation beyond the date set to the Scheduler's max option crashes the browser (#3393)
  • Moving a Scheduler event across the Daylight Saving Time transition date adds hours to its duration (#3282)
  • Scheduler "Today" button does not navigate to the correct day according to the timezone set (#3271)
  • Dragging a Scheduler event to the AllDaySlot and back changes the event's duration (#3211)
  • Scheduler does not display event on the spring daylight saving day with workDayStart configured (#3039)
  • Scheduler throws n.innerRect is not a function error when creating an event with duration of 24 hours, which spans over the spring daylight saving change (#2958)
  • Scheduler incorrectly calculates recurring events start/end time in daylight saving scenarios (#2770)
  • Event view of the mobile Scheduler with Flat theme has missing icons and misalignments. (#2603)
  • Cancelling Edit on Recurring appointment removes the 'edited' occurence from UI (#2595)
  • When start editing a single occurrence of reoccurring event, change Start time or All day value and then cancel the edit, the event disappears from Scheduler (#2513)
  • Event created on 10/30/2016 is not rendered in DayView (#2393)
  • Scheduler throws n.innerWidth is not a function(…) error, when creating an event with duration of 23h or more on the day of Daylight saving change (#2371)
  • Scheduler generates incorrectly recurring daily events (every second day), when created before daylight saving change and ending after that (#2362)
  • DST recurring event is not rendered correctly, when Scheduler and events are in different timezones (#2271)
  • Buttons are displaced in 'Delete Recurring Item' dialog with Material skin
  • Scheduler does not expand recurring events with 2 weeks interval
  • Occurrences are rendered unexpectedly
  • Widget does not expand 'daily' frequency with interval:2 correctly
  • group.date throws an error when no group.resources are set (#3505)

Spreadsheet

What's new

  • fix(spreadsheet): Use font icon for page orientation preview in export dialog (#3362)
  • Improve performance of copy-paste from Excel to Spreadsheet (#3361)
  • Keep all values available in the column filter menu, even if filter by value has been already applied (#3319)

What's fixed

  • Input in Spreadsheet's Hyperlink dialog falls on a second line below its label
  • Editing a range selection doesn't allow tabular editing (#3495)
  • JS error on undo after pasting text from external source in Spreadsheet cell (#3486)
  • String starting with a date (Mar 2017 randomText) is converted to date on pasting in a Spreadsheet cell, stripping the non-date part (#3476)
  • Spreadsheet freeze panes + borders on merged cells results in missing borders after scroll (#3444)
  • Spreadsheet "sort" breaks formula cell references [fix included]. (#3442)
  • Spreadsheet export to Excel does not work if there is a merged cell in row 10+ (#3389)
  • Applying filter by value and then filter by condition on the same column results in an error (#3317)
  • Spreadsheet steals the focus from the focused element when keyboard down / up arrow is pressed (#3315)
  • defaultCellStyle could not be set on the Spreadsheet (#3309)
  • Spreadsheet loses Time, when editing cell with custom Date and Time formatting (#3169)
  • Editing cells in range, when filter is applied, modifies the cells in between (#2880)
  • Bad icons in Spreadsheet's Export PDF dialog (#2697)
  • Spreadsheet destroy method does not terminate the widget completely. (#3278)
  • Change the icon of the Export button (#3274)
  • Missing Spreadsheet toolbar buttons localization (#3261)
  • Undo is not triggering the change event (#3069)
  • resize method does not resize the toolbar (#2927)
  • Cannot choose from all items when filtering is applied once (#1797)
  • 12 hours format time in lower/upper case is not respected
  • Displaced Spreadsheet dialog buttons
  • Wrong number rounding when cell format is applied to a formula (#3520)

Switch

What's fixed

  • Switch labels are not displayed in IE9 (#3199)

TabStrip

What's fixed

  • Disabled tabs in the Bootstrap skin have borders
  • "k-state-active" class is added to the selected TabStrip tab after its content is loaded (#3345)
  • Tabstrip's scroll buttons positioned incorrectly (#3299)
  • TabStrip tab content receives incorrect height of 0px after being disable and re-enabled, with custom animation configured. (#3164)
  • TabStrip's right scroll button is not visible on resizing window (#3131)
  • JavaScript error on scrolling TabStrip tabs, if animation is disabled with jQuery.fx.off (#3130)
  • Setting scrolling: true disables the TabStrip's scrolling tabs (#3016)
  • Unexpected TabStrip tabs top border in High Contrast theme
  • Pressing Down key in TabStrip with dir=rtl should navigate to next item instead of the previous one.
  • insertBefore and insertAfter fail when TabStrip has an ID with special characters (#3421)

ThemeBuilder LESS

What's fixed

  • Gantt toolbar border radius does not use variables in Bootstrap v3 theme (#2676)

ThemeBuilder SASS

What's fixed

  • Unexpected second vertical scrollbar on ThemeBuilder preview pages in Firefox

TimePicker

What's fixed

  • TimePicker does not preserve the new value when dateInput is enabled (#3179)

ToolBar

What's fixed

  • Non-text Image Button image not centered vertically (#3335)
  • Pressing Down key in ToolBar with dir=rtl should navigate to next item instead of the previous one. (#2528)
  • Toolbar's overflow button in RTL mode scrolls page to top under IE (#3121)
  • ToolBar buttons lose their right :focus border for Material and MaterialBlack themes, when another button immediately follows the current one

Tooltip

What's fixed

  • Tooltip width is not calculated depending on the content length (#3379)
  • Tooltip does not hide as expected when another Tooltip is opened (#3333)
  • Title element is not removed on time in IE11 (#1043)

TreeList

What's new

  • TreeList keyboard support.

What's fixed

  • TreeList column attributes are not applied in edit mode. (#3224)

TreeView

What's fixed

  • Unclickable Template Checkboxes in TreeView (#3292)
  • Correct insertAfter and insertBefore return value in API (#3283)
  • TreeView should mark all non-selected nodes with aria-selected false attribute (#3200)
  • Unexpected increased spacing between nodes and checkboxes in TreeView
  • Unclickable Template Checkboxes in TreeView

Upload

What's fixed

  • Dropping folder with more than 100 files in it uploads only 100 files (#3518)
  • Upload widget with custom template can never retry an upload (#3188)

Window

What's fixed

  • Incorrect navigation with Tab in Window (#3243)
  • Setting and removing of overflow:hidden style on the document during Window maximization and restore should check if the style is already present (#984)
  • Focusing a textbox nested in Window does not highlight its text (#3244)
  • Window with pinned: true and defined position in percent sets incorrect position on open (#3331)
  • k-window-content box-sizing changed between 2017 R1 and R2 (#3187)
  • Window resizing does not work correctly when the widget is pinned and the page is scrolled (#1026)
  • Resizing doesn't work properly when Window is appended (#245)
